display_long_description:
rooom empowers you to create engaging environments for virtual showcases, such as: 
- Interactive meeting rooms
- Virtual showrooms & walkable shops
- Smart learning environments for trainings, workshops & onboardings
- Digital event venues
- And much more

# How does it work?

With the rooom Space Editor, you can **build virtual environments** with no need for coding. They can be visited both on the web with different devices and via app on VR headsets. Users can: 
- Interact with the environment 
- Discover integrated content 
- Meet other guests using your avatar 

To create and manage your own content, you need a subscription for rooom. **Downloading the app and visiting spaces is free of charge.**

# Enjoy your virtual spaces in high-resolution VR quality

Create unique virtual venues for **live performances, interactive exhibitions, training spaces and vivid product presentations**. Wow the guests at your next trade show appearance and let them immerse themselves in virtual brand worlds, walk through vibrant exhibition halls and marvel at high-resolution artworks and 3D models. Use our best practice templates or design your own digital experience world – there are no limits!
